alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...SAN JACINTO...NORTHWESTERN LIBERTY...SOUTHWESTERN POLK AND NORTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Point Blank to near Coldspring to near Splendora to near Spring. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humble, Cleveland, Livingston, Kingwood, Spring, Shepherd, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Cut And Shoot, Coldspring, Point Blank, Plum Grove, Goodrich, North Cleveland, Woodloch, Seven Oaks, Lake Livingston State Park, and West Livingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto
